actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

official_title: To authorize a settlement in accordance with the agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority and the United States Department of the Interior, and counties within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.
short_title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2017

summary.text:
Great Smoky Mountains National Park Agreement Act of 2017

 This bill directs the National Park Service to transfer a specified amount to counties within Great Smoky Mountains National Park in accordance with the Memorandum of Agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley Authority and the Department of the Interior, dated February 2010, that supersedes the agreement of July 30, 1943.
